Text: FW Reallocation of Control and Support Responsibilities f Cc PST ARPAtxt Sorry ladies I had the wrong email addresses for you so probably did not receive this the first time Thanks Original GabrielWes outlining the split of responsibilities per the meeting we had Ive taken a quick look and seems OK He did list cash reconciliations as Operations which is correct for the UBSW model but I dont think weve discussed yet who does this or resourcingI think its done by someone in Greg Whitings group Vito Sabatelli had sent an email to Per on the topic but no updatenot sure if you want to take up with Wes as well If you have any issues plse go back to Wes or Gabriel thanks Liliana Forward Header Subject FW Reallocation of Control and Support Responsibilities f Author ShirleyTijerina Shirley NRONcom at unixmime Date AM All Please review the attached and come back to Wes or myself ASAP in case there are any doubts or comments on the contents of the document Best regards Gabriel
